Budō Lineage Tree

Kotani Sumiyuki

小谷 澄之

JPN

* 1903 Nakagawa, Aogo, Hyogo Japan - † 1991 Nishinomiya, Hyogo Japan

Open in tree ID page Source YAML

Sumiyuki Kotani (小谷 澄之, Kotani Sumiyuki; August 3, 1903 – October 9, 1991). Judo ambassador who travelled around with Kano, and one of this last direct students.

Teachers

  • Kanō Jigorō -> Kotani Sumiyuki 嘉納 治五郎 (Kōdōkan Jūdō)

Students

Rank

  • Kōdōkan Jūdō 講道館柔道 : 10 dan ( Kanō Jigorō ) ( Kodokan )
